id: scenario-value-scanner-child-scenarios-neighborhood-child learns community economic power through collective action
title: Child learns community economic power through collective action
description: Child learns community economic power through collective action
content:
Scenario: Child learns community economic power through collective action
    Given neighborhood families make coordinated choices
    And Emma participates in community economic patterns
    When Emma sees collective neighborhood impact
    Then she should learn about community economic agency
    And her personal_agent should explain collective power age-appropriately
    And the agent should say "When families choose together, stores listen"
    And she should understand communities can shape markets
    And care economy includes collective organizing dimension
    And she should learn early about community economic power
